data.eml:eml: Ancyronyx reticulatus and A. pulcherrimus, two new riffle beetle species from Borneo, and discussion about elmid plastron structures (Coleoptera: Elmidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kodada, Ján, Jäch, Manfred A., Jr, Fedor Čiampor (2014): Ancyronyx reticulatus and A. pulcherrimus, two new riffle beetle species from Borneo, and discussion about elmid plastron structures (Coleoptera: Elmidae). Zootaxa 3760 (3): 383-395, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3760.3.5
